PS4でずっとプレイしていましたが、キラーのキャラコンは
やはりPC版の方が良い。

パブリックテストバージョンもプレイできるし、チャットもできるし
ボタン配置の振り分けもカスタムできるし。

最近はキラーやサバイバーが増えて
パークも増えてきて色々と覚えるのが大変。
　
それでもリリースしてから長年愛されているゲームだと思います。
人気映画とのコラボがあったり、プレイヤーを随時楽しませてくれている。

家庭用ゲーム機とPCで交互に遊んでいます。
Если собрать друзей и играть в пати - то весело:)

This game used to be fun, but now there are many problems that will not get fixed such as game balance, bugs and outdated features. Each update moves the game into a less stable state and to unlock non licensed characters and perks today takes thousands of hours and a lot of money. This game is not worth buying or playing anymore.
Игра хороша. Но кемперы и туннелеры задолбали

Solo queuing as a survivor will often pair me up with some poor teammates, while queuing as a rank 20 killer will more often than not put me against a group of red ranked SWF squads. I find it difficult to articulate just how awful this is without the use of expletives. I don't care about queue times, when I am trying to learn or just play a killer nothing destroys my desire to do so faster than playing against a team of people who are much more skilled at the game than I am, and who usually seem to enjoy telling me just how bad I am in endgame chat. Given that the MMR system is straight up broken, I cannot recommend this game to new players because of how lopsided it makes the match ups. Sure KYF is an option, but for those of us who keep a smaller wolf pack than others this isn't really feasible. Unless you have a group of friends who already play or have an abundance of patience I would steer clear of this game.

Love the game even when the killer is facecamping or the team is complete trash. I mean, these people suck, but they're in every game, so those complaining about it clearly have nothing better to do. I don't read post game chat because who cares what any other those people have to say anyway? If you're taking it personally, that's on you. People suck. That's just how humans work. Regardless, I would recommend this game after playing for a while.

La esencia del juego es interesante, destacando los personajes, sus habilidades, y el modo de juego, pero presenta un grave problema de matchmaking, siendo muy notorio el desbalance de las partidas. Sin contar el hecho de que por dar "variedad" terminan matando mecanicas propias del juego, al ofrecer muchisimas ventajas a los sobrevivientes, sin mencionar que ellos tienen la opcion de jugar en party (no bastando con esa ultra gran ventaja de 4 vs 1). Poco para corregir, pero necesario en un punto inmediato, antes que empeore el tema.

Первое правило данной игры - соблюдать кодекс сурвов. Играешь за мана и тебе нужно додержать чела до 2-й стадии - кемпер. Взял ноед - лс. Бегаешь по карте за сурвами - тунеллер. Не дал сурву перепрыгнуть через препятствие - токсик. Нашёл сурва, дал хит или не стал поднимать, думаю что у него осколок - токсик. Поэтому игра очевидна хороша, ведь в ней есть правила, которые чтят комьюнити данной игры

This game can be fun on your own, but I find that it's even better with friends. The sound design of the game is excellent in my mind, ramping up tension for Survivors when in the presence of a Killer and giving you a disturbed sense of satisfaction when you catch one as a Killer. The base characters available are excellent to get you started, and you can unlock new Survivors or Killers without downloading any DLC (though it does take a very long time to earn that many Iridescent Shards (the currency needed to unlock characters and/or their outfits in the in-game store for free)).
Since I started playing, the Halloween event has come and gone and the Artist (new Killer) released. It feels like a game with an active team of developers to me.
I would recommend this, though I must say I feel bad as a Killer sometimes.
